Test Case Change Classification.Acceptance Criteria - Modified Content: Validate repository visibility settings (Public/Private) are applied correctly during creation and reflect the selected option post-creation.

Test Case Impact Details.Affected Test Case Name: Validate repository visibility setting is applied and reflected post-creation
Test Case Impact Details.New Modified Test Case Steps:
1. Login to GitHub with valid credentials.
2. Click on 'New repository' button.
3. Enter repository name and description.
4. Select 'Public' visibility option.
5. Click on 'Create repository' button.
6. Verify that the created repository is visible as 'Public'.
7. Repeat steps 3-6 for 'Private' visibility option and verify repository is visible as 'Private'.
Test Case Impact Details.New Modified Expected Results: Repository is created with the selected visibility setting and the visibility is correctly reflected post-creation.
Test Case Impact Details.What changed in Test Cases Steps & Expec: New test case created to validate that repository visibility settings (Public/Private) are correctly applied during creation and reflected post-creation as per new acceptance criteria.
